title: Growth of an organic co-crystal upon a component subphase.
abstract:
noWe report on the templated growth of 2:1 benzoic acid/isonicotinamide co-crystal on a benzoic acid subphase. The\ud
molecular basis for the template, registry between the phases, is presented. The template growth of behavior of the title compound\ud
was contrasted with that from melt and solution. This approach may be applicable as a precursor for the synthesis of bulk composite\ud
crystals
